member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.SDKManager.AXBridge
member.summary: Provides a bridge to overloaded methods that X++ cannot access.

member.summary: Returns the property list value of a property.
member.param: Hashtable containing all of the payment properties.
The namespace of the property to seek.
The name of the property to seek.
member.returns: True if the property was found, false if not found.
